title: Proactive Feature Recommendation
description: A system alert shows a customer is manually performing a task that could be automated with an existing feature. A success agent reaches out.

tasks.description: Review the customer's usage logs that triggered the alert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer is repeatedly exporting data and then re-importing it after making changes.

tasks.description: Contact the customer and explain how they can achieve the same outcome using the 'Bulk Edit' feature directly within the application.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the more efficient workflow.

tasks.description: Offer to schedule a brief screen-share session to walk them through the feature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides proactive support to improve customer efficiency and satisfaction.
